Uses of Package
co.cask.cdap.api.customaction

  • Packages that use co.cask.cdap.api.customaction 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api.customaction  
    co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
    For constructing workflows.
    co.cask.cdap.client.app  
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.customaction used by co.cask.cdap.api.customaction 
    Class and Description
    CustomAction
    Defines custom action in the Workflow.
    CustomActionConfigurer
    Configurer for configuring the CustomAction in the Workflow.
    CustomActionContext
    Represents runtime context of the CustomAction in the Workflow.
    CustomActionSpecification
    Specification for the custom java code that will be executed as a part of Workflow.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.customaction used by co.cask.cdap.api.workflow 
    Class and Description
    CustomAction
    Defines custom action in the Workflow.
    CustomActionSpecification
    Specification for the custom java code that will be executed as a part of Workflow.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.customaction used by co.cask.cdap.client.app 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCustomAction
    This abstract class provides a default implementation of CustomAction methods for easy extensions.

    Defines custom action in the Workflow.
